subject: Acceptance of ‘Bid Security and Performance Security’ as physical Bank Guarantee along with e-BG till 31.12.2023
text: IRdy 754 TTTHTf qfera5rot (T9w5 4Rdev & RNTAf 4A1T4, HRT TRER) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) #44A T i1-5 Qa 6, #z7-10, &Rq, T fcrif 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 THN/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Bank Guarantee/2023 Circular No_ 3.1.39/ 2023 dated 17th 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. F.NHAI/CGM(F)/e-BG/2022/e-157054-1/Part-2 (Comp No. 199940)} Sub: Acceptance of Bid Security and Performance Security' as physical Bank Guarantee along with e-BG till 31.12.2023- reg: NHAI Policy Circular No_ 3.1.36/2022 dated 05.12.2022 was issued conveying the approval of Competent Authority to accept the Bid Security and Performance Security in theform of Account payee Demand Draft; Banker'$ Cheque or e-Bank Guarantee as per the MoRTH letter No_ NH-35014/20/2020-H dated 12.08.2022. Further , NHAI vide Circular No: 3,1.38/2022 dated 23.12.2022 decided to accept Physical Bank Guarantee also till 31.03.2023 . 2 considering the practical difficulties faced by different divisions in various States where e-BGs could not be issued due to e-Stamping issues or limited Banks on e-BG platform; Competent Authority has decided to accept the Bid Security and Performance Security' as physical bank guarantee along with e-BG till 31.12.2023. However, in order to encourage the bidders, agencies towards   digitization, all concerned officials are directed to encourage the bidders/agencies to submit e-BGs to mitigate the risk Of fake BGs, reduce the paper work and easy verification of Bank Guarantee: 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: [o523 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1.
